SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = 'java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#analytics-tool.jar"' : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -action &ACTION_NAME#")
! !AWI base URL : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SNAP_AWI_URL# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ANALYTICS_SCREENSHOTS.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -url &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! AWI Version : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -v &UC4RB_SNAP_AWI_VER#")
! Connection : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SNAP_CONN# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ANALYTICS_SCREENSHOTS.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -n &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Client : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SNAP_CLIENT# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ANALYTICS_SCREENSHOTS.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -c &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Username : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SNAP_USR# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ANALYTICS_SCREENSHOTS.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -u &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Department : IF &UC4RB_SNAP_DEP# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SNAP_DEP# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ANALYTICS_SCREENSHOTS.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE@UNIX : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -d &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#") : ENDIF
! Page Load Timeout : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -t &UC4RB_SNAP_PAGE_TIMEOUT#")
! Ignore SSL issues : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -ssl &UC4RB_SNAP_SSL#")
